title: Wortenia Senki (LN) - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Fantasy   Harem   Martial Arts   Shounen
tags: Adapted to Manga   Arrogant Characters   Calm Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Cunning Protagonist   Discrimination   Elves   Fearless Protagonist   Kingdom Building   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Multiple Transported Individuals   Nobles   Politics   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Revenge   Royalty   Ruthless Protagonist   S*ave Harem   S*aves   Strategist   Strong to Stronger   Sword And Magic   Transported to Another World   Twins   War Records   Wars
author: Hori Ryouta   保利亮太
description: High school student Mikoshiba Ryouma was summoned to a different world for the sake of helping his summoner wage wars. Sensing the malice from the one who summoned him, he reacted by killing the summoner, one of the most important people in the empire. After the escape, he rescues a pair of twin sisters from the hands of bandits. The sisters who can use magic, swear to serve him as subordinates. Thus, Ryouma begins his journey on the path of the supreme ruler.>
